data.name: 2 Ninjas 1 Cup - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Download your favorite tracks from "2 Ninjas 1 Cup" in extended versions for totally freeeeeee!*

This pack of 10 tracks contains all of the music you can hear in the game, including such classics as "Level A", "Intro" and, let's not forget, "Boss 2 (Main Theme)".

Download your copy now!


*"2 Ninjas 1 Cup" required.
